title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Launch Day Impressions - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
New World: Aeternum is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Phasmophobia releases on PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29. Wishlist now!
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010

Download the Marvel Snap app now available on the App Store, Google Play and Steam, or visit http://www.marvelsnap.com to learn more.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades. 

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:45 - Housekeeping
00:06:21 - Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Launch Day Impressions
00:32:29 - Campaign
00:44:34 - Zombies
00:52:38 - SuperChats

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell:

Gamescast Background Art by https://twitter.com/Orioto
In Review Intro Videos by: https://twitter.com/CameronKen
In Review Intro Music by: https://twitter.com/CarterHarrell

Listen To Our Podcasts On Your Favorite Podcast Service:

The Kinda Funny Podcast: https://bit.ly/3wA9GVo

Kinda Funny Xcast – An Xbox Podcast: https://bit.ly/36twqvD
Kinda Funny Screencast – TV & Movie Reviews Podcast: https://bit.ly/3e7yQ75

Follow The Kinda Funny Team:
